help:
Help menu
	/bkw lang [list -> show languages;][set -> set language;][update or flash -> update languages;]
	/bkw add <keyword> <permissonGroup> <infoPart1> <infoPart2> <...> -> to add custom reply
	/bkw rm <keyword> <permissonGroup> -> to remove custom reply
	permissonGroup: p -> this group; u -> all groups; f -> all friends; g -> all groups and friends(global)
chmHelp:
/alias add <old command> <command alias> => add command alias for old command
/alias rm <old command> <command alias> => remove command alias for old command
